title: Pokedex
content: Tired of all the regular pokemones? Looking for something new? up to 8,000 newly fused pokemons, this website is the best to discover your next favorite pokemon

title: Chess
content: The first big project of the course. A chess game for two players.

title: Books
content: A CRUD app that allow the user to create delete post and edit the books that in the database.

title: online editor
content: A mentor - student website that contains a few code-blocks leading to a coding page, the code-block page changes in real-time for all of the users.

title: web scraper
content: Project with Rapid 7. A dark-web (using tor) scraper that analize the scraped data.
